p.s: In the excerpt of his speech, he gave before a discussion rondround with a students' roundtable in aprilApril 2009 in Istanbul, former president of the United States of America, Barack Obama, talks about the importance of student exchanges.
In the beginning, he menshionsmentions, that his main goal is to make the relationship between the US and the muslimMuslim world even stronger.
After that, he talks about the positive effects, like Americans who volunteer abroad that are willing to learn more about the world around them.
Then, he explains, that student exchanges lead to the reveal of common humanity what results in less mistrust we have against each other.
In the end he encourages the listener to change something and that the choice is up to them.
